description: The fundamental layout container. Use Box as the primary building block for all layouts - sections, grids, flex containers, wrappers, and any structural element.
useCase: Use Box for: layout structure (flex, grid), sections/containers, wrappers for grouping, positioning contexts (relative/absolute), spacing control (padding, margin)
examples: Hero section container with flex layout

style.description: CSS styles - most commonly used for display (flex/grid), positioning, spacing, and sizing

as.description: HTML tag to render as (div, section, article, aside, nav, header, footer, main)

bestPractices: Use 'as' prop to render semantic HTML (section, article, nav, etc.)
Prefer flex/grid over float for layouts
Use relative positioning for creating positioning contexts
